languages.text: Основа любой власти — труженики и солдаты, безликая и безымянная масса исполнителей. В глазах Империума они — просто ресурс, легко добываемый и восполнимый.
The foundation of any rule are workers and soldiers, a faceless and nameless mass of the rank and file. In the eyes of the Imperium, they are merely a resource, easily procurable and renewable.
languages.original_text: Основа любой власти — труженики и солдаты, безликая и безымянная масса исполнителей. В глазах Империума они — просто ресурс, легко добываемый и восполнимый.

traits.locale_text: The foundation of any rule is workers and soldiers, a faceless and nameless mass of the rank and file. In the eyes of the Imperium, they are merely a resource, easily procurable and renewable.

The foundation of any rule are workers and soldiers, a faceless and nameless mass of the rank and file. In the eyes of the Imperium, they are merely a resource, easily procurable and renewable.

languages.text: Los cimientos de cualquier gobierno son los trabajadores y soldados, una masa sin rostro de personal. A ojos del Imperium, se trata de un recurso más, uno renovable y de fácil obtención.
languages.original_text: The foundation of any rule are workers and soldiers, a faceless and nameless mass of the rank and file. In the eyes of the Imperium, they are merely a resource, easily procurable and renewable.

traits.locale_text: Los cimientos de cualquier gobierno son los trabajadores y soldados, una masa sin rostro de personal. A ojos del Imperium, se trata de un recurso más, uno renovable y de fácil obtención.

languages.text: Tout régime repose en premier lieu sur ses ouvriers et ses soldats, les masses anonymes qui constituent ce que l'on appelle le petit peuple. Aux yeux de l'Imperium, ils sont avant tout une ressource renouvelable bon marché.
languages.original_text: The foundation of any rule are workers and soldiers, a faceless and nameless mass of the rank and file. In the eyes of the Imperium, they are merely a resource, easily procurable and renewable.

traits.locale_text: Tout régime repose en premier lieu sur ses ouvriers et ses soldats, les masses anonymes qui constituent ce que l'on appelle le petit peuple. Aux yeux de l'Imperium, ils sont avant tout une ressource renouvelable bon marché.

languages.text: 任何统治都离不开工人与士兵，而这些人只不过是一群面目模糊、默默无闻的普通民众。在帝国眼中，人民不过是一种可以轻易获得、轻易再生的资源罢了。
languages.original_text: The foundation of any rule are workers and soldiers, a faceless and nameless mass of the rank and file. In the eyes of the Imperium, they are merely a resource, easily procurable and renewable.

traits.locale_text: 任何统治都离不开工人与士兵，而这些人只不过是一群面目模糊、默默无闻的普通民众。在帝国严重，人民不过是一种可以轻易获得、轻易再生的资源罢了。

languages.text: どのような支配の基盤も労働者と兵士であり、顔も名前もない大勢の階層である。帝国の目にうつる彼らは簡単に調達でき、再生可能な単なる資源に過ぎない。
languages.original_text: The foundation of any rule are workers and soldiers, a faceless and nameless mass of the rank and file. In the eyes of the Imperium, they are merely a resource, easily procurable and renewable.

traits.locale_text: どのような支配の基盤も労働者と兵士であり、顔も名前もない大勢の階層である。帝国の目にうつる彼らは簡単に調達でき、再生可能な単なる資源に過ぎない。

languages.text: Das Fundament jeder Herrschaft sind Arbeiter und Soldaten, eine gesichts- und namenlose Masse. In den Augen des Imperiums sind sie lediglich eine Ressource, leicht zu beschaffen, leicht zu ersetzen.
languages.original_text: The foundation of any rule are workers and soldiers, a faceless and nameless mass of the rank and file. In the eyes of the Imperium, they are merely a resource, easily procurable and renewable.

traits.locale_text: Das Fundament jeder Herrschaft sind Arbeiter und Soldaten, eine gesichts- und namenlose Masse. In den Augen des Imperiums sind sie lediglich eine Ressource, leicht zu beschaffen, leicht zu ersetzen.

languages.text: Her türlü yönetimin temelinde işçiler ve askerler, aşağı tabakanın yüzü ve ismi meçhul kitleleri bulunur. İmparatorluk'un gözünde onlar, kolayca tedarik edilip yenilenebilen bir kaynaktan ibarettir.
languages.original_text: The foundation of any rule are workers and soldiers, a faceless and nameless mass of the rank and file. In the eyes of the Imperium, they are merely a resource, easily procurable and renewable.
